awards.text: Nominated for 1 Oscar. Another 4 wins & 1 nomination.

fullplot: The story of two immigrant couples: Teresa and Angelo; Pierina and Massimo. While fighting for survival in the new world, the unexpected love of Massimo and Teresa appears. They react against family and cultural traditions and leave to a new destiny, leaving their partners. Quatrilho is the name of a card game in wich the player have to betray his partner in order to become the champion.
plot: Two couples of Italian immigrants are part of a game that leads to treason and brings serious consequences to those who lose.
title: O Quatrilho
